TEI.2.document_title: Horatio Reynolds to Stephen F. Austin, 02-20-1826

barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1265

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p* Receipt for wages.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**person_mentioned*Col Stephen F. Austin*/person_mentioned**/p* *p*To *person_mentioned*Reynolds Dr.*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*for 15 days services a 1$_________________________________________________$15.*/p*
*p**location_mentioned*Buffalo Bayou*/location_mentioned**/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="02-20-1826">20 feby 1826*/date_mentioned* Recd Payment in *location_mentioned*Landoffice */location_mentioned*Money*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Horatio Reynolds*/person_mentioned**/p* */div1*
